net.proteusframework.email.config

Class ProgrammaticEmailConfigType

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.email.config.ProgrammaticEmailConfigType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.i2rd.implementationmodel.IImplementationModel<ProgrammaticEmailConfig>, net.proteusframework.core.locale.OptionallyLocalizedNamedObject, EmailConfigType<ProgrammaticEmailConfig>

    @ImplementationModel
public class ProgrammaticEmailConfigType
extends Object
implements EmailConfigType<ProgrammaticEmailConfig>
    EmailConfigType for programmatically defined content.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • configureRecipients

        public static void configureRecipients(EmailTemplateContext context,
                       List<net.proteusframework.users.model.Principal> recipients)
        Configure recipients. You can also configure a single recipient with EmailTemplateContext.withRecipientAttribute(Principal). If you configure multiple recipients, then the DomainModelContext.getPrincipal() will not be set.
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        recipients - the recipients.

      • configureRecipients

        public static void configureRecipients(EmailTemplateContext context,
                       net.proteusframework.users.model.Principal... recipients)
        Configure recipients. You can also configure a single recipient with EmailTemplateContext.withRecipientAttribute(Principal). If you configure multiple recipients, then the DomainModelContext.getPrincipal() will not be set by this code.
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        recipients - the recipients.

      • createEmailTemplateSearchSupplier

        public net.proteusframework.ui.search.SearchSupplier createEmailTemplateSearchSupplier(EmailConfigType.PreInitContext localeContextSource)
        Description copied from interface: EmailConfigType
        Optionally create a search supplier for a search UI for finding the EmailTemplates that are specific to this type.

        The QLBuilder used by the supplier should be rooted at EmailTemplate and return EmailTemplate.

        Specified by:
        createEmailTemplateSearchSupplier in interface EmailConfigType<ProgrammaticEmailConfig>
        Parameters:
        localeContextSource - a source to obtain a LocaleContext.
        Returns:
        the search supplier or null.

      • createTestingUI

        public net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.Component createTestingUI(Supplier<EmailTemplate> emailTemplate)
        Description copied from interface: EmailConfigType
        Create a testing UI that is specific to this configuration type. This method should only be called if the EmailTemplate is considered to be valid.
        Specified by:
        createTestingUI in interface EmailConfigType<ProgrammaticEmailConfig>
        Parameters:
        emailTemplate - the email template supplier.
        Returns:
        the UI or null to use the default UI.
        See Also:
        EmailTemplateTester

      • getDescription

        public net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedText getDescription(net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocaleContext context)

      • getDomainModelContext

        public com.i2rd.domainmodel.context.DomainModelContext getDomainModelContext(EmailTemplateContext emailTemplateContext,
                                                                    ProgrammaticEmailConfig emailConfig)
        Description copied from interface: EmailConfigType
        Builds a DomainModelContext to use for an EmailTemplate. The context returned must be configured with the processing context's Locale and TimeZone, and it should have sufficient suppliers and extensions to resolve variables for the system using the template.

        This can be called during display of documentation, during testing, during validation, and while processing an EmailTemplate to generate email data. You can determine what operation is occurring by calling EmailTemplateContext.getMode().

        Specified by:
        getDomainModelContext in interface EmailConfigType<ProgrammaticEmailConfig>
        Parameters:
        emailTemplateContext - the processing context.
        emailConfig - the email configuration.
        Returns:
        a DomainModelContext, ready to use for generating a message from an EmailTemplate

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(EmailTemplate emailTemplate,
              net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notifiable notifiable)
        Description copied from interface: EmailConfigType
        Test if the specified email template is considered value. This should be in addition to the standard validation done for all types of EmailTemplates. If you have no additional validation, return true.
        Specified by:
        isValid in interface EmailConfigType<ProgrammaticEmailConfig>
        Parameters:
        emailTemplate - the email template.
        notifiable - the notifiable to send messages.
        Returns:
        true if valid; otherwise, false.
